articles.title: Vivo promises three years of Android updates for upcoming flagships - The Verge
articles.description: Vivo’s upcoming X-series flagship phones will receive three years of Android OS and security updates. The policy covers phones released after July 2021 in Europe, Australia, and India.
articles.content:
The policy covers X-series phones released after July 2021
